edu.cnm.deepdive.nasaapod.view

Class HistoryAdapter.Holder

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.ViewHolder
      • edu.cnm.deepdive.nasaapod.view.HistoryAdapter.Holder
  • Enclosing class:
    HistoryAdapter

    public class HistoryAdapter.Holder
extends RecyclerView.ViewHolder
    Maintains a connection between a View and an Apod instance. The HistoryAdapter manages the creation and re-use of HistoryAdapter.Holder instances as rows are scrolled into and out of view.

    Each view item is clickable (the View.OnClickListener attached to each is the host HistoryFragment), supporting display of an APOD selected from the list view.
